results.content: Lessons were easy to follow.  Definitely recommend having some experience with REST API and dependency injection before taking this course.

results.content: I want to tell you that this course is very awesome. Every thing is explained very well. The Automapper and OData sections are very nice and to be honest this is my first course I've ever taken online and believe me my experience with this platform and with this instructor is excellent.
